text: "Believe" is a song by American country music duo Brooks & Dunn from her ninth studio album, Hillbilly Deluxe (2005). ==Music video== It premiered on CMT on November 17, 2005. The video debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of December 1, 2005. It made history on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for being at number one for consecutive two weeks. ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads
title: Believe (Brooks & Dunn song)
